import './App.css'; import moment from 'moment'; import React, {useState} from 'react'; function App() { const api = { key: "32ba0bfed592484379e51106cef3f204", base: "https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/" } const [query, setQuery] = useState(''); const [weather, setWeather] = useState({}); const search = evt => { if (evt.key === "Enter") { fetch(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/forecast?q=${query}&appid=32ba0bfed592484379e51106cef3f204`) .then(es => es.json()) .then(esult => { setWeather(esult); setQuery(''); console.log(esult); }); } } const gettdate=(d,k)=> { let days = ["Sun", "Mon", "Tues", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"]; let a=d.getDay()+k if(a>=7) a=a%7 let day = days[a]; return `${day}` } const dateBuilder = (d) => { let months = ["January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"]; let days = ["Sun", "Mon", "Tues", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"]; let day = days[d.getDay()]; let date = d.getDate(); let month = months[d.getMonth()]; let year = d.getFullYear(); return `${day} ${date} ${month} ${year}` } setInterval = () => { let time = new Date(); let hour = time.getHours(); let hoursIn12HrFormat = hour >= 13 ? hour %12: hour let minutes = time.getMinutes(); let ampm = hour >=12 ? 'PM' : 'AM' return `${hoursIn12HrFormat}:${minutes} ${ampm}` } return (
220) ? 'container2' : 'epage') : 'container'}>
{ setInterval() }
{ dateBuilder(new Date()) }
{(typeof weather.city != "undefined") ? (
Humidity - {weather.list[0].main.humidity}%
Maximum Temperature - {weather.list[0].main.temp_max}°c
Minimum Temperature - {weather.list[0].main.temp_min}°c
Pressure - {weather.list[0].main.pressure} Pascals
Wind Speed - {weather.list[0].wind.speed} anemometer
Sunrise - {moment(weather.city.sunrise * 1000).format('HH:mm ')}hrs Sunset - {moment(weather.city.sunset * 1000).format('HH:mm ')}hrs
) : ('')}
{(typeof weather.city != "undefined") ? (
{weather.city.name}
{weather.city.coord.lat} , {weather.city.coord.lon}
) : ('')}
setQuery(e.target.value)} value={query} onKeyPress={search} />
{(typeof weather.city != "undefined") ? (
{ gettdate(new Date(),0)}
Max Temp - {weather.list[0].main.temp_max}°c
Min Temp - {weather.list[0].main.temp_max}°c
sky - {weather.list[0].weather[0].description}
{ gettdate(new Date(),1)}
Max Temp - {weather.list[1].main.temp_max}°c
Min Temp - {weather.list[1].main.temp_max}°c
sky - {weather.list[1].weather[0].description}
{ gettdate(new Date(),2)}
Max Temp - {weather.list[2].main.temp_max}°c
Min Temp - {weather.list[2].main.temp_max}°c
sky - {weather.list[2].weather[0].description}
{ gettdate(new Date(),3)}
Max Temp - {weather.list[3].main.temp_max}°c
Min Temp - {weather.list[3].main.temp_max}°c
sky - {weather.list[3].weather[0].description}
{ gettdate(new Date(),4)}
Max Temp - {weather.list[4].main.temp_max}°c
Min Temp - {weather.list[4].main.temp_max}°c
sky - {weather.list[4].weather[0].description}
{ gettdate(new Date(),5)}
Max Temp - {weather.list[5].main.temp_max}°c
Min Temp - {weather.list[5].main.temp_max}°c
sky - {weather.list[5].weather[0].description}
{ gettdate(new Date(),6)}
Max Temp - {weather.list[6].main.temp_max}°c
Min Temp - {weather.list[6].main.temp_max}°c
sky - {weather.list[6].weather[0].description}
) :('')}
); } export default App;
